vclaim: A Chicago Tribune op-ed headlined, "Let’s wait before turning slain 13-year-old Adam Toledo into a martyr," argued that "it’s not too early to stop romanticizing and infantilizing 13-year-olds."
title: Is This a Real Chicago Tribune Column About Adam Toledo?
subtitle: A Chicago Tribune op-ed generated outrage over its take on the killing of 13-year-old Adam Toledo.
author: Bethania Palma
